message.content: {"id": "14943", "title": "Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends", "description": "The Code Assist feature in the software does not follow the expected behavior for platform line endings.", "OB": "When using the Code Assist feature with files that contain different line endings, such as CR/LF, the software does not handle them correctly.", "EB": "The Code Assist feature should properly handle files with different line endings, respecting the platform line ends.", "SR": "The software should be modified to correctly interpret and respect the line endings when providing code suggestions through the Code Assist feature."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
